bug.author: blingeee
bug.description:
Describe the bug An error occurred while executing the ProfileReport() function. However, if the Path type column is removed, no error occurs. To Reproduce My dataframe is <denchmark-code>+--------------------+--------------------+ | vod_url| path| +--------------------+--------------------+ |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| |http://www.acme.c...|/SH55126545/VD551...| +--------------------+--------------------+ </denchmark-code>
The vod_url column is of type url and path is of type path. This is the execution source. <denchmark-code>from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport pdf= df.toPandas() profile = ProfileReport(pdf, title='Pandas Profiling Report', html={'style':{'full_width':True}}) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16662143/77449701-a2179d00-6e35-11ea-9e61-b45aaf0fcdba.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>profile.to_file(output_file="vod.html") </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16662143/77449805-c70c1000-6e35-11ea-96ef-bb004d51b616.png></denchmark-link>
The error occurs only when creating the json file below. (OverflowError: Maximum recursion level reached) <denchmark-code>profile.to_file(output_file="vod.json") </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>OverflowErrorTraceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-35-71c09216169a> in <module>() ----> 1 profile.to_file(output_file="vod.json")
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas_profiling/__init__.py in to_file(self, output_file, silent) 141 data = self.to_html() 142 elif output_file.suffix == ".json": --> 143 data = self.to_json() 144 else: 145 raise ValueError("Extension not supported (please use .html, .json)")
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas_profiling/__init__.py in to_json(self) 206 return {"__{}__".format(o.__class__.__name__): str(o)} 207 --> 208 return json.dumps(self.description_set, indent=4, cls=CustomEncoder) 209 210 def to_notebook_iframe(self):
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/__init__.py in dumps(obj, skipkeys, ensure_ascii, check_circular, allow_nan, cls, indent, separators, default, sort_keys, **kw) 236 check_circular=check_circular, allow_nan=allow_nan, indent=indent, 237 separators=separators, default=default, sort_keys=sort_keys, --> 238 **kw).encode(obj) 239 240
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in encode(self, o) 199 chunks = self.iterencode(o, _one_shot=True) 200 if not isinstance(chunks, (list, tuple)): --> 201 chunks = list(chunks) 202 return ''.join(chunks) 203
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in _iterencode(o, _current_indent_level) 428 yield from _iterencode_list(o, _current_indent_level) 429 elif isinstance(o, dict): --> 430 yield from _iterencode_dict(o, _current_indent_level) 431 else: 432 if markers is not None:
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in _iterencode_dict(dct, _current_indent_level) 402 else: 403 chunks = _iterencode(value, _current_indent_level) --> 404 yield from chunks 405 if newline_indent is not None: 406 _current_indent_level -= 1
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in _iterencode_dict(dct, _current_indent_level) 402 else: 403 chunks = _iterencode(value, _current_indent_level) --> 404 yield from chunks 405 if newline_indent is not None: 406 _current_indent_level -= 1
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in _iterencode_dict(dct, _current_indent_level) 402 else: 403 chunks = _iterencode(value, _current_indent_level) --> 404 yield from chunks 405 if newline_indent is not None: 406 _current_indent_level -= 1
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py in _iterencode(o, _current_indent_level) 435 raise ValueError("Circular reference detected") 436 markers[markerid] = o --> 437 o = _default(o) 438 yield from _iterencode(o, _current_indent_level) 439 if markers is not None:
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas_profiling/__init__.py in default(self, o) 200 o, pd.core.frame.DataFrame 201 ): --> 202 return {"__{}__".format(o.__class__.__name__): o.to_json()} 203 if isinstance(o, np.integer): 204 return {"__{}__".format(o.__class__.__name__): o.tolist()}
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/core/generic.py in to_json(self, path_or_buf, orient, date_format, double_precision, force_ascii, date_unit, default_handler, lines, compression, index) 2422 lines=lines, 2423 compression=compression, -> 2424 index=index, 2425 ) 2426
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/io/json/_json.py in to_json(path_or_buf, obj, orient, date_format, double_precision, force_ascii, date_unit, default_handler, lines, compression, index) 76 date_unit=date_unit, 77 default_handler=default_handler, ---> 78 index=index, 79 ).write() 80
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/io/json/_json.py in write(self) 133 self.date_unit, 134 self.date_format == "iso", --> 135 self.default_handler, 136 ) 137
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/io/json/_json.py in _write(self, obj, orient, double_precision, ensure_ascii, date_unit, iso_dates, default_handler) 186 date_unit, 187 iso_dates, --> 188 default_handler, 189 ) 190
/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas/io/json/_json.py in _write(self, obj, orient, double_precision, ensure_ascii, date_unit, iso_dates, default_handler) 153 date_unit=date_unit, 154 iso_dates=iso_dates, --> 155 default_handler=default_handler, 156 ) 157
OverflowError: Maximum recursion level reached </denchmark-code>
If the path type column is removed, no error occurs, so I think the cause is in the path type column. However, the exact cause is still unknown. Version information:
Python version: Python 3.6.7 Environment: Jupyter Notebook pip: If you are using pip, run pip freeze in your environment and report the results. The list of packages can be rather long, you can use the snippet below to collapse the output.
Click to expand Version information
alembic==0.9.9 asn1crypto==0.24.0 astroid==2.3.3 astropy==4.0 attr==0.3.1 attrs==19.3.0 backcall==0.1.0 beautifulsoup4==4.5.3 bleach==2.1.3 bokeh==0.12.15 boto==2.49.0 boto3==1.12.11 botocore==1.15.11 comments.comment: Thanks! Fixed in the master. Will release soon.
